title: OK so I just got harrassed
body:
And no, I wasn't called anything. I got some random chat message in the client saying "you mother fucker shit".

Just, random. I did play against this guy once, once, 7 days ago and he hasn't been in a game in the last 6 days.

Should I do anything with this, or more so, can I do anything with this?

replies.body:
He is just a bad troll who doesn't even know how to pick fights properly, just ignore him, don't waste your effort and time I say.

Or just ubfriend him.

Maybe he was just trying to be funny but failed miserably, there is that possibility too but we don't know.

He isn't even on my friends list.

EDIT: Infact I don't ever have anyone on my friends list.
